page.title: 03A SURVEY OF VILLAGE SHOPS
page.content: On 5th June 1985, we went to{Sandy {Lane}to ask the villagers what they thought about the shops there. The people said that the shops were reasonable and that they were very handy and the shopkeepers were friendly. Some said that the shops were used for daily shopping for things like bread and meat.The rest of the things they buy at supermarkets,although a few use the{village shops}more. "The quality and prices at the shops are reasonable," some people said, but a few more of them said the goods were more expensive. The shops in the village have everything you need,although someone said that{Sandy Lane}could do with a chemist, but she doesn't think they will get one in the near future.
